type.name: product_concept_organisation_or_person_in_organisation_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Product_concept.

type.name: product_concept_project_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of projects to Product_concept.

entity.name: Market
entity.description: A Market is an object which identifies all or a specific subset of users/ consumers of proposed or realized product.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the market is known.

explicit.name: type
explicit.description: an identification of the kind of market.

entity.name: Product_concept
entity.description: A Product_concept is a conceptual model of something an organisation has identified as a general class of end item product for a market. A Product_concept is uniquely identified by an identifier and an organisational scope of that identifier.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identification of the Product_concept assigned by the organisation.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the product is known.

explicit.name: target_market
explicit.description: the Market for which the Product_concept is intended.

inverse.name: identifier
inverse.description: the organisation (or person in an organisation) that assigned and owns the Product_concept.

inverse.name: projects
inverse.description: the optional set of projects related to the Product_concept.

unique.label: UR1
unique.description: The combination of the id, and identifier shall be unique.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The identifier role shall be 'concept owner'.
